text:
For your old iPhone now give 701 rubles to the phone
05 Nov 2019, 16:55 by Nikita Goryainov
December on the nose, time to update the park of gadgets. Sell them and spend money on something useful.
Why is it worth it now? It's just that Yota and DamProdam technology buyback service now give money to the phone bill for each subscriber who looks at Yota and sells his old device to them.
Get money for the old gadget, and a nice bonus to your mobile account is a double benefit.



How it works:
1. Come to the Yota outlet in Moscow (list below)
2. Leave there with a Yota tablet an application for the sale of any device: Apple smartphone, Samsung, Huawei, Apple Watch, Apple laptops and tablets, and even PlayStation consoles
3. A master comes to you at a convenient time and place, picks up the device and gives money to his hands, without the hassle, bargaining and unnecessary expectations.
4. Did the deal take place? Well, money immediately arrives at the Yota account.
701 rubles - yes, just as much, and no, I don‚Äôt know why so - subscribers of the Yota operator will get to their mobile phone account. The result is a triple benefit: saving time, money on hand and a nice bonus on your mobile account.
